text: Giacomo Biffi (13 June 1928 â€“ 11 July 2015) was an Italian Cardinal of the Roman Catholic Church. - English translation of selected excerpts He was Archbishop Emeritus of Bologna, having served as archbishop there from 1984 to 2003. He was elevated to the cardinalate in 1985. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Italian cardinals Category:People from Milan Category:Italian Roman Catholic archbishops
